FOUND IN: Goulash (a type of Hungarian stew with meat and vegetables, seasoned with paprika)
Custer (most famous General associated with the Battle of the Little Big Horn, also known as Custer's Last Stand.)
Nutlet (a small nut or one that resembles a nut in appearance and structure but does not develop from a fertilized ovule)
Amazon (the most prominent river in South America, which runs through countries like Brazil and Peru).
